channel.title: Josh Zipin's Corner of The Internet
channel.description: Recent content on Josh Zipin's Corner of The Internet

item.description: JZ work play Adventurer My parents tell me that at 9 months I skipped crawling and went straight to running. My mom has been beating herself up about it for years but I think I turned out fine. I played Division I soccer at Davidson College and represented the United States in the Maccabiah Games in Israel. I was friends with Stephen Curry in college.

JZ work play Hustler I made my first $100 in middle school selling baseball cards and mix CDs. In college I ran a $50k textbook business on campus. I sold sneakers. My first job was raising money for athletics at my alma mater, Davidson College. For fun I made a business plan for a Shark Tank entrepreneur making 100% recyclable sneakers. I moved to San Francisco.
